moduleMetadataJson.name: Multi Gather DNS Forward Lookup Bruteforce
moduleMetadataJson.description: Brute force subdomains and hostnames via wordlist.
author: Carlos Perez <carlos_perez@darkoperator.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: DOMAIN
options.description: Domain to do a forward lookup bruteforce against.

options.name: NAMELIST
options.description: List of hostnames or subdomains to use.
